template.name: presentation
template.color: color - Scribus website (or team Rabobank jersey ;))
template.descr: Based on the Maciej Hanski's presentation layout. I made it more simple because I like simple things. Used often in my office presentations.
template.usage: Right click on text replace what's inside with your own. (Beware the management newspeak! ;)
